Text.Section:
WARNING FLAMMABLE
Keep away from fire or flame. To reduce risk of fire, PREP CAREFULLY:
* do not use 26-ml applicator for head and neck surgery or on an area smaller than 8.4 in. * 8.4 in. Use a smaller applicator instead. * solution contains alcohol and gives off flammable vapors * avoid getting solution into hairy areas. Hair may take up to 1 hour to dry. Wet hair is flammable. * do not drape or use ignition source (e.g. cautery, laser) until solution is completely dry (minimum of 3 minutes on hairless skin; up to 1 hour in hair) * do not allow solution to pool * remove wet materials from prep area
